Interface ViewFactory

public interface ViewFactory
an interface can create instance of View to show different kinds of chart

    • createView

      static View createView(String viewType, String dataGroup, boolean predicted)
      Parameters:
      viewType - it specifies the type of visualization
      dataGroup - it specifies the which group of data is used to display on chart
      predicted - it specifies if the chart is used to show predicated datq
      Returns:
